Summary: Tri-Pane UI + Explain This View (Frontend Extension)
Description: Plugin renders synchronized timeline/map/graph panes with brushing + explainer panel (XAI overlays, provenance tooltips). Repo: plugins/tri-pane-explain/. Zero edits to core UI; module federation only.
Epic Name: Tri-Pane UI + Explain This View (Frontend Extension)
Acceptance Criteria: Zero edits to core UI; module federation only. Accessibility audits pass; screenshots diff-stable. Metrics emitted to OPS pack.

Epic Link: Tri-Pane UI + Explain This View (Frontend Extension)
Acceptance Criteria: Extension registers correctly; queries are read-only; no core UI edits.
